data.title: Automated Tape Libraries: Preserving and Protecting Enterprise Data
data.meta_description: Explore the scalability and storage density of Spectra TFinity tape libraries. Find out how they lead in innovation and proactive media management.
data.text:
Tape Storage Products

Automated Tape Libraries

Preserve, protect & defend enterprise data at scale

From entry class to enterprise scale

The only tape libraries you need for both traditional & modern tape applications

Spectra Logic is focused on delivering world-class data protection solutions that leverage our more than 40 years of tape experience to deliver superior reliability, scalability, and affordability. From our first tape library in 1995, to our flagship TFinity libraries that scale to more than two exabytes of uncompressed data capacity, we’ve earned the trust of many of the world’s most recognized organizations to protect some of the world’s most valuable data.

Spectra TFinity Series

Spectra TFinity series tape libraries deliver industry-leading scalability and storage density packaged in the smallest footprint of any enterprise library.

Spectra T950

The Spectra T950 midrange tape library leads in innovation, flexibility, performance and functionality, from high storage capacity to proactive media management.

Spectra Cube

The Spectra Cube cloud-optimized tape library blends superior versatility and ease-of-use into a cost-effective solution for today's cloud environments.

Spectra Stack

The Spectra Stack entry-class tape library is a stackable solution designed for modern data centers. Stack libraries uniquely support a 100% duty cycle for 24x7 operation.

Menu

Key benefits of Spectra tape libraries

Air-gapped protection against cyber threats

Easy upgrades for investment protection

Enjoy high capacity, high performance or both

Preserve & protect data for multiple decades

Most cost-effective option for data at scale

Our end-to-end solutions

We’ve integrated our data management software & storage systems to deliver complete solutions for preserving & protecting data at scale. Whether files or objects, backups, or active- & long-term archives, Spectra tape-based solutions cost-effectively safeguard your organization’s data – from terabytes to exabytes.

On-Prem Glacier

Create secure & resilient S3 Glacier storage tiers with better-than-cloud performance & compelling cost savings.

Spectra Digital Archive

Automate digital preservation with easy, efficient tiering that optimizes cost & power consumption.

Spectra Media Archive

Integrate popular media management apps with object-based tape to streamline workflows from ingest to distribution.

Tape Archive Platform-as-a-Service

Combines the benefits of traditional tape storage with the convenience and flexibility of a cloud-based, as-a-service model.

On-Prem Glacier Workflow

Spectra Digital Archive Workflow

On-Prem Glacier Workflow

Spectra Digital Archive Workflow

Spectra Legacy Tape Libraries

Spectra libraries are designed with your long-term needs in mind. Users of Spectra legacy libraries can take advantage of drive technology upgrades, easy migration to new libraries, as well as ongoing maintenance and support. With the ability to transfer existing drives and media to new Spectra libraries, users can modernize their infrastructure while remaining fully compatible with existing applications.
